test_questions.question: The price of the book is marked 20% above the C.P. If the marked price of the book is Rs. 180, then what is the cost of the paper used in a single copy of the book?
test_questions.explanation:
Clearly, marked price of the book = 120% of C.P.
Also, cost of paper = 25% of C.P
Let the cost of paper for a single book be Rs. n.



Then, 120 : 25 = 180 : n          n = Rs.

25 x 180

= Rs. 37.50 .


120
